content: this pattern is about two things 1 making a custom dice bag with some serious magic cred and 2 having a dice bag that fits a lot of crap inside if you want to make a pokemon dice bag - or any type of dice bag other than a magic-themed dice bag - i am sorry to report that this is not the pattern for you i still like you though you don t need any extras for the bag just black or maybe brown yarn plus two shades of whatever color mana you want to appear on the sides of your bag e g a pale green and a bolder green if you love yourself some ramp or a gray and a black if you like the graveyard shenanigans my bag features two mana colors but if you are devoted to the monocolored decks you can repeat the same symbol on both sides be sure to download a charts for the mana symbols you want and b the instructions for making the bag itself
